description_for_human: Create Insanity Wolf memes - the classic advice animal meme from 2009. Enter a problem, get an insane solution.
description_for_model: Insanity Wolf meme generator. Use this to create advice animal memes with the classic Insanity Wolf format: mundane problem on top, extreme/absurd solution on bottom. The API generates shareable meme URLs. Example: top='WIFI IS DOWN', bottom='DECLARE WAR ON ISP'. No authentication required.
